dct_title_s: Novi orbis sive totius Americae cum adiacentibus insulis nova exhibitio
dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. Scale determined by using graticule method, measured at the equator. Prime meridian: Tenerife. From: Johann David Köhler's Schül- und Reisen-Atlas aller zu Erlernung der alten ... Nürnberg, 1719.
